messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/3/2002 10:51:31 AM Pacific Daylight Time, ... Try half.com ----- it is sometimes cheaper than the library fines that I end up paying for
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/3/2002 10:51:31 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I don't know if Sandra has responded yet, (haven't gotten that far into my
> email yet this morning. <g>) but she has a list of wonderful books on her
> site. I have been checking them out lately. (so far none available at my
> library, but I did sit at Barnes one afternoon and read through some.) Here
>
> are two links to her sites.
>

Try half.com ----- it is sometimes cheaper than the library fines that I end
up paying for good books! <G>

--pam

National Home Education Network
http://www.NHEN.org
Changing the Way the World Sees Homeschooling!
